response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe holds immense value for you. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price. We kindly propose a transaction amount of $1,350,000. This offer encapsulates the essence of the product's worth while ensuring a mutually beneficial agreement. We look forward to discussing this further and exploring how this product can elevate your experience or business operations.", "product_price": 1350000}
